connector.description: Consume events from an Azure Storage Blob change feed.

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-changef.name: camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-changefeed-source.period
camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-changef.description: The interval (in milliseconds) between fetches to the Azure Storage change feed.

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-changef.name: camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-changefeed-source.accountName
camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-changef.description: The Azure Storage Blob account name.

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-changef.name: camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-changefeed-source.accessKey
camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-changef.description: The Azure Storage Blob access Key.

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-changef.name: camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-changefeed-source.credentialType
camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-changef.description: Determines the credential strategy to adopt. Possible values are SHARED_ACCOUNT_KEY, SHARED_KEY_CREDENTIAL and AZURE_IDENTITY
